description:
The course starts from scratch: where to start, that is, if we talk about strategy, what are the first steps I should take? Then answer the question; What strategy should I follow already beginning to make important decisions. Following is how to make our business innovator, source of competitive advantage, funding source. And finally, it is implementation, ie how to implement the strategy in the business, often the hardest when succeed.

                                            Syllabus
                        Module 0. Presentation and Methodology
Module 1. Where do I start?
Module 2. Which strategy should I follow?
Module 3. How do innovative?
Module 4. And now, how do you implement?
Module 5. Summary and Conclusions
title: Estrategia Avanzada para Emprendedores
